capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry has a wand as one of his belongings. That's pretty clear-cut, isn't it? I mean, in the wizarding world, wands are like an extension of who you are, right? It makes sense that Harry would have one, given his... complicated history with magic.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud to say that I have a strong affinity for the Hogwarts school of magic. It's just so fascinating to me, you know? The history, the magical creatures, the whole wizarding world... it all feels so immersive and real. I've always felt like I'd fit right in at Hogwarts, surrounded by fellow students who share my passion for magic.

I'm a huge fan of the Hogwarts houses, and I have to say, being affiliated with Hogsmeade village is really cool. It's like, you're part of this whole magical community that's just waiting to be explored. I've always been drawn to the idea of being a bit of an outsider, but still having a strong connection to the wizarding world - it sounds like me!
